entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
